doc:
Stephen Lewis (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stephen_Lewis_(actor) 0 Stephen Lewis (17 December 1926 – 12 August 2015), credited early in his career as Stephen Cato, was an English actor, comedian, director, screenwriter, and playwright. He is best known for his television roles as Inspector Cyril "Blakey" Blake in the LWT sitcom On the Buses, Clem "Smiler" Hemmingway in Last of the Summer Wine, and Harry Lambert in BBC Television's Oh, Doctor Beeching!, although he also appeared in numerous stage and film roles. Stephen_Lewis ( 17_December_1926 – 12_August_2015 ) , credited early in his_career as Stephen_Cato , was an_English_actor , comedian , director , screenwriter , and playwright . He is_best_known for his_television_roles as Inspector_Cyril_"_Blakey_"_Blake in the_LWT_sitcom On the_Buses , Clem_"_Smiler_"_Hemmingway in Last of the_Summer_Wine , and Harry_Lambert in BBC_Television 's_Oh , Doctor_Beeching ! , although he also appeared in numerous_stage_and_film_roles .
